issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: There seems to be a missing space in the titles of our webpages. EG: <title>Hadoop NameNodestyx01.sf.cloudera.com:8021</title>. It seems like the JSP compiler is doing something to the space which is in the .jsp. Probably a simple fix if you know something about JSP :)
fields.summary: dfshealth.jsp missing space between role and node name

comments.body: I have attached a trivial patch which fixes this issue.

-1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12511392/HDFS-2818.patch
  against trunk revision .

    +1 @author.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    -1 tests included.  The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
                        Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
                        Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

    -1 javadoc.  The javadoc tool appears to have generated 21 warning messages.

    +1 javac.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

    +1 eclipse:eclipse.  The patch built with eclipse:eclipse.

    -1 findbugs.  The patch appears to introduce 1 new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

    +1 release audit.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

    +1 core tests.  The patch passed unit tests in .

    +1 contrib tests.  The patch passed contrib unit tests.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HDFS-Build/1793//testReport/
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HDFS-Build/1793//artifact/trunk/hadoop-hdfs-project/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshadoop-hdfs.html
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HDFS-Build/1793//console

This message is automatically generated.
{{nbsp;}} in titles is fine, lgtm. +1, committing.

    HDFS-2818. Fix a missing space issue in HDFS webapps' title tags. (Devaraj K via harsh)
